title: Smart Housing Application
problem: Real-time property valuation and market trend analysis is often inaccessible to average buyers.
approach: Integrated predictive AI models within a cross-platform mobile interface for instant property insights.
outcome: Delivered accurate price predictions and enhanced user decision-making processes.

title: Business Invoicing Solution
problem: Small businesses lack automated tools for processing and categorizing invoice data efficiently.
approach: Developed a mobile scanning app with OCR capabilities and intelligent expense categorization.
outcome: Reduced manual data entry time by 60% for beta test users.

title: AI Food Recommendation App
problem: Personalized dietary planning and recipe discovery can be overwhelming and disjointed.
approach: Built a recommendation engine analyzing user preferences to suggest tailored meal plans.
outcome: Successfully deployed an intuitive app focusing on user retention and health goals.

title: Modern Corporate Website
problem: Businesses need responsive, high-performance web presence to establish credibility.
approach: Utilized React and modern CSS to create a pixel-perfect, responsive landing page.
outcome: Improved page load speeds and SEO rankings for the client portfolio.

title: Interactive Blog Platform
problem: Content creators require a flexible, custom CMS to manage and publish articles.
approach: Implemented a MERN stack solution with a rich text editor and dynamic content rendering.
outcome: Enabled seamless content management with secure authentication and real-time updates.

title: E-Commerce Storefront
problem: Scalable online retail platforms require robust state management and secure transaction handling.
approach: Designed a Redux-managed shopping cart with Stripe integration for secure payments.
outcome: Launched a fully functional store capable of handling complex product variations.

title: Snake Game
problem: Demonstrating game loop efficiency and collision handling in a desktop environment.
approach: Applied OOP principles to manage game state, rendering, and input handling in C#.
outcome: Created a smooth, bug-free classic game experience with score tracking.

title: Tic Tac Toe
problem: Implementing game logic and AI opponents using basic algorithms.
approach: Developed a Windows Forms application with a Minimax algorithm for the CPU opponent.
outcome: Showcased clean event-driven programming and logical problem solving.

title: Turn-Based Strategy Game
problem: Complex state management required for turn sequencing and unit attributes.
approach: Designed a class hierarchy for units and a central game manager to control flow.
outcome: Successfully modeled complex interactions and state persistence between turns.

title: Library Management System
problem: Manual tracking of book inventory and member loans is prone to error.
approach: Built a desktop application with Java Swing and File I/O for data persistence.
outcome: Streamlined the borrowing process and automated fine calculations.

title: Banking System Simulator
problem: Simulating secure transactions and account management data structures.
approach: Implemented secure user authentication and transaction logging using encapsulation.
outcome: Demonstrated robust security principles and reliable data handling.

title: Employment Management
problem: HR departments need efficient tools to track employee data and performance.
approach: Designed a modular system for CRUD operations on employee records.
outcome: Produced a clean, maintainable codebase adhering to SOLID principles.

title: Doctor Appointment System
problem: Patients face friction when booking appointments through traditional phone methods.
approach: Developed a web-based booking interface connected to a MySQL database.
outcome: Reduced wait times and improved clinic schedule organization.

title: Personnel Scheduling Tool
problem: Complex shift patterns are difficult to manage manually for large teams.
approach: Created an automated scheduling algorithm to assign shifts based on availability.
outcome: Optimized workforce allocation and minimized scheduling conflicts.

title: E-Commerce Platform
problem: Building a custom online store structure from scratch to understand core commerce logic.
approach: Implemented a MVC architecture to separate business logic from the presentation layer.
outcome: Delivered a secure, scalable platform with inventory and order management.
